detail_desc: Mesh sandals that have adjustable straps with a hook and loop fastening over the foot and around the ankle. Moulded insoles and fluted soles.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in supersoft, stretch denim with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, fly with a press-stud and slim legs.

prod_name: Zoo strap dress frill S.1 w
detail_desc: Short dress in an airy viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a frill-trimmed sweetheart neckline. Gathered seam at the waist and smocking at the back. Unlined.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle at the top and adjustable, padded shoulder straps. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Padded back plate and base. Lined. Size 14x30x45 cm. The polyester content of the backpack is recycled.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded, raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved dresses in patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flounced skirt.
Swim top in UV-protective fabric with a print motif on the front, stand-up collar and raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
Hexagonal earrings. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.

prod_name: TD Roger eller TD Poplin 29 by
detail_desc: Shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Calf-length cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Ribbing down the button band and at the cuffs and hem.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Vest top in soft jersey made partly from organic cotton.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short puff sleeves trimmed with a decorative bow, a seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Trousers in satin with a high waist that has covered elastication and loops, one with a decorative D-ring. Diagonal side pockets, flap leg pockets with a tab and D-ring and long, tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Blouse woven in a cotton blend with a sewn-in wrapover front and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Sewn-on tie belt at the waist and a flared peplum.
Metal earrings decorated with sparkly stones and fabric tassels. Length 7 cm.

Shirt in a viscose weave with decorative trims on the shoulders. Collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and long sleeves with a tab and button.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a viscose blend with a slightly wider neckline and front pocket. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and ribbing around the neckline and hems.

Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button. Flap side and back pockets with a concealed button and large leg pockets with a flap and button. Straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, fitted blouse in crisp cotton poplin with smocking at the back, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and short, voluminous puff sleeves with concealed elastication.
Double metal bangle. Width 0.8 cm.
Sports vest top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas with a jersey strappy top and woven bottoms. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and straight, wide legs.

Short-sleeved shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Pleated, V-neck blouse in an airy weave with pleats around the neckline, raglan, balloon sleeves, narrow cuffs with a covered button, and a detachable fabric belt at the waist. Relaxed fit.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist with a hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake back pockets and slim legs with creases.
Hat in woven fabric with earflaps and faux fur details. Sewn-in turn-up at the front, a strap with a plastic fastener under the chin and a small zipped pocket at the back. Quilted lining.

Blouse in lightweight Tencel™ lyocell denim with an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Yoke with a frill trim at the front that continues over the shoulders, and 3/4-length sleeves with covered elastication and ties at the cuffs.

Vest top in airy jersey with a print motif on the front and rounded hem.
Shorts in a textured linen blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, tie belt, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a text print on the front.
Fitted jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
A-line dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a detachable belt in braided imitation suede. Long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.

Top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a wide, frill-trimmed V-neck and silicone trim at the shoulders. Short, scalloped sleeves, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently flared, scalloped peplum.
Long vest top in soft cotton jersey with deep armholes, a seam centre back, slits in the sides and a rounded hem at the front. Straight-cut and slightly longer at the back.
Wide, double-breasted coat in soft wool with wide notch lapels, dropped shoulders, flap front pockets and adjustable tabs with a button at the cuffs. Lined.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and super-skinny legs.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with a fake fly, fake front pockets, back pockets and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.

Sleeveless body in airy jersey with cut-out sections at the back. Narrow cut at the top with gathers at the front, and a decorative drawstring at the back with ties at the back of the neck. Seam at the hips and a lower section in softer jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Calf-length kaftan in an airy weave with a small, gathered stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening at the top. Concealed buttons down the front and short sleeves.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, small bow at the front and lined gusset.

Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Low-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Shirt in a cotton weave with collar and buttons down the front. Buttoned chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Ankle-length dungarees in washed cotton denim with adjustable straps that fasten at the front. Side and back pockets, concealed elastication at the back of the waist and wide straight legs.

Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and hem, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
